publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-199 Dennis Canavan: Denny High School Boys’ Football Team—That the Parliament congratulates Denny High School boys' football squad on winning the Coca-Cola 7s Scottish seven-a-side football championship at Hampden Park and wishes them well in their forthcoming visit to Barcelona.
S2M-199 Denny High School Boys' Football Team (lodged on 24 June 2003) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-199 Dennis Canavan: Denny High School Boys' Football Team—That the Parliament congratulates Denny High School boys' football squad on winning the Coca-Cola 7s Scottish seven-a-side football championship at Hampden Park and wishes them well in their forthcoming visit to Barcelona. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson
S2M-199 Denny High School Boys' Football Team (lodged on 24 June 2003) Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-199 Denny High School Boys' Football Team (lodged on 24 June 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
